property.name: Text
property.value: Seeker role only. During conflicts at this province, each player cannot spend fate from his or her fate pool.

property.name: Text
property.value: Keeper role only. Reaction: After this province is revealed - gain 1 fate for each attacking character.

property.name: Traits
property.value: Bushi. Yojimbo.

property.name: Text
property.value: Reaction: After this character wins a conflict as a defender - resolve the ring effect of that conflict as if you were the attacking player. (Max 1 per conflict.)

property.name: Text
property.value: Limit 1 per deck. Action: Give an opponent 1 fate. Choose an attachment on a character that player controls - take control of that attachment and attach it to an eligible character you control, if able. Otherwise, discard it.

property.name: Text
property.value: Action: During a conflict - move this character home.

property.name: Text
property.value: Courtesy. No Poison attachments. Reaction: After this character enters play, choose an unbroken province - turn that province facedown.

property.name: Traits
property.value: Bushi. Commander.

property.name: Text
property.value: Reaction: After this character wins a [Military] conflict - draw 1 card.

property.name: Text
property.value: Limit 1 per deck. [Political] conflicts cannot be declared against this holding's province.

property.name: Traits
property.value: Shugenja. Void.

property.name: Text
property.value: Immune to opponents' ring effects. While this character is attacking, the contested ring gains the [Void] element. If this character wins the conflict as an attacker, instead of choosing an element to resolve, resolve each of that ring's effects.

property.name: Traits
property.value: Bushi. Imperial. Magistrate.

property.name: Text
property.value: While this character is attacking, each other character that has 1 or more fate on it does not count its skill toward the resolution of this conflict.

property.name: Text
property.value: Action: Sacrifice this holding, select one - each player gains 2 fate or each player gains 2 honor. Refill this province faceup.

property.name: Traits
property.value: Item. Seal.

property.name: Text
property.value: Attached character gains the [Crane] clan symbol and the Duelist trait.

property.name: Text
property.value: Keeper role only. Action: During a conflict, if you control a participating Courtier character - until the end of the conflict, the attacked province gets +X strength. X is equal to the number of cards in your opponent's hand.

property.name: Traits
property.value: Item. Jade.

property.name: Text
property.value: Action: Bow this attachment. Choose an unclaimed ring - move 1 fate from the chosen ring to another unclaimed ring.

property.name: Text
property.value: Seeker role only. Reaction: After you lose a [Political] conflict, choose a Bushi character you control - put a Weapon attachment with printed cost 3 or lower into play from your hand or conflict discard pile, attached to that character.

property.name: Traits
property.value: Spell. Void.

property.name: Text
property.value: Play only if you control a Shugenja character. Interrupt: When 1 or more fate would be removed from attached character - instead, move that fate to your fate pool.

property.name: Traits
property.value: Peasant. Shinobi.

property.name: Text
property.value: Reaction: After you play this character - look at an opponent's hand.

property.name: Text
property.value: Action: During a conflict, choose any number of attacking Shinobi characters you control - move each chosen character home.

property.name: Traits
property.value: Goblin. Shadowlands.

property.name: Text
property.value: Reaction: After this character enters play - place 1 fate from an opponent's fate pool on it.

property.name: Traits
property.value: Item. Jade.

property.name: Text
property.value: Attach to a character you control. Interrupt: When the effects of a card ability that targets attached character would initiate, sacrifice this attachment - cancel those effects.

property.name: Text
property.value: Air role only. Action: During a conflict at this province, choose a participating character - discard each attachment on that character.

property.name: Text
property.value: Action: During a conflict at this province, if you control 3 or more participating Bushi characters, choose a participating character - bow that character.

property.name: Traits
property.value: Bushi. Imperial. Magistrate.

property.name: Text
property.value: While this character is defending, each character with printed cost 2 or lower does not count its skill toward the resolution of this conflict.

property.name: Traits
property.value: Courtier. Actor.

property.name: Text
property.value: Action: Spend 1 fate - this character gets +X[Military] until the end of the conflict. X is equal to its [Political] skill.

property.name: Text
property.value: Keeper role only. Action: While this character is participating in a conflict, choose a participating character you control with 1 or more attachments - until the end of the conflict, that character is immune to events.

property.name: Traits
property.value: Bushi. Courtier.

property.name: Text
property.value: Action: While this character is participating in a conflict, discard the Imperial Favor - turn each facedown card in each of your provinces faceup. Then, put up to 2 characters from your provinces into play participating in this conflict.

property.name: Text
property.value: Action: Look at the top 3 cards of an opponent's deck. Discard 1 of those cards, place another on top of that deck, and the other on the bottom of that deck.

property.name: Traits
property.value: Bushi. Imperial. Magistrate.

property.name: Text
property.value: While this character is participating in a conflict, ignore the effects of each status token on each participating character.

property.name: Traits
property.value: Courtier. Daimyo.

property.name: Text
property.value: Action: While this character is participating in a conflict, choose a ready non-participating character with printed cost 2 or lower controlled by each player - move each chosen character to the conflict.

property.name: Text
property.value: Limit 1 per deck. Interrupt: When this holding's province is broken - shuffle this card back into your dynasty deck.

property.name: Text
property.value: Seeker role only. Interrupt: When the effects of a triggered ability on the attacked province would initiate, if attached character is attacking, sacrifice this attachment - cancel those effects.

property.name: Text
property.value: Action: During a [Military] conflict in which you are the defending player - turn a dynasty card in the attacked province faceup. Then, if that card is a character, put it into play as a defender.

property.name: Text
property.value: Restricted. Attached character gets +2[Political] while it is involved in a duel. Reaction: After attached character wins a duel - gain 1 honor.

property.name: Text
property.value: Action: During a [Military] conflict, bow a (friendly) participating Monk character. Choose a participating character controlled by your opponent - bow that character. It cannot trigger abilities during this conflict.

property.name: Text
property.value: Bushi character only. Restricted. Reaction: After a character triggers an ability during a conflict in which attached character is participating - bow that character.

property.name: Text
property.value: Reaction: After this character enters play, reveal the top 3 cards of your conflict deck - add each Spell and each Kiho card revealed by this ability to your hand and discard the rest.

property.name: Text
property.value: Keeper role only. Action: During a conflict in which you are the defending player, choose a defending character and an attacking character with equal or lower printed cost - move each chosen character home.

property.name: Traits
property.value: Item. Seal.

property.name: Text
property.value: Attached character gains the [Scorpion] clan symbol and the Shinobi trait.

property.name: Text
property.value: Cavalry character only. Action: Choose a Cavalry character you control - attach this card to that character.

property.name: Text
property.value: Action: During a conflict, choose a participating character you control and a participating character your opponent controls - your character challenges the opponent's character to a [Political] duel. The controller of the losing character reveals his or her hand. That player's opponent chooses and discards 1 card from it.

property.name: Text
property.value: Fire role only. Interrupt: When this province is broken, choose an opponent's character - move each fate from that character to a character you control with no fate.

property.name: Text
property.value: Cannot be a stronghold province. Interrupt: When this province would be broken, if there are no honor tokens on it - place 1 honor token on it instead.

property.name: Traits
property.value: Courtier. Daimyo. Imperial.

property.name: Text
property.value: Action: While this character is participating in a conflict, discard the Imperial Favor - draw 3 cards. Reduce the cost of each event you play during this conflict by 2.

property.name: Text
property.value: Limit 1 per deck. [Military] conflicts cannot be declared against this holding's province.

property.name: Traits
property.value: Bushi. Imperial. Magistrate.

property.name: Text
property.value: While this character is attacking, only characters that have an odd printed cost count their skill toward the resolution of this conflict.

property.name: Traits
property.value: Shugenja. Water.

property.name: Text
property.value: Action: While the [Water] ring is claimed - ready this character.

property.name: Text
property.value: Interrupt: When a [Scorpion] character you control leaves play - attach that character to this holding facedown instead of placing it in its owner's discard pile. Action: Play an attached facedown character from this holding as if it were in this province. Then, sacrifice this holding.

property.name: Traits
property.value: Cavalry. Scout.

property.name: Text
property.value: Reaction: After a province this character is attacking is revealed - the attacker has the first action opportunity this conflict.

property.name: Text
property.value: Reaction: After this character is declared as an attacker, discard the top card of your dynasty deck - this character gets +X[Military] until the end of the conflict. X is the printed cost of the discarded card.

property.name: Traits
property.value: Bushi. Scout.

property.name: Text
property.value: Reaction: After you play this character - it gains covert until the end of the phase.

property.name: Traits
property.value: Item. Seal.

property.name: Text
property.value: Attached character gains the [Crab] clan symbol and the Berserker trait.

property.name: Traits
property.value: Kiho. Water.

property.name: Text
property.value: Reaction: After your opponent declares a [Water] conflict, choose a Monk character or a character with a Monk attachment - ready that character and draw 1 card.

property.name: Text
property.value: During a conflict in which this character is participating, increase the cost for each player to play each event by 1.

property.name: Text
property.value: Action: During a conflict, if your honor bid is lower than your opponent's, choose a [Lion] character you control - move that character to the conflict. Then, honor it.

property.name: Traits
property.value: Spell. Air.

property.name: Text
property.value: Action: During a conflict, bow a (friendly) [Phoenix] Shugenja character. Choose a participating character you control - honor that character.

property.name: Traits
property.value: Courtier. Imperial.

property.name: Text
property.value: Action: While this character is participating in a [Political] conflict, choose a participating character with lower [Political] skill than this character - move the chosen character home. Then, you may bow it.

property.name: Text
property.value: Action: During a conflict, if your honor bid is at least 2 higher than your opponent's - each participating character your opponent controls gets -1[Military] and -1[Political] until the end of the conflict.

property.name: Text
property.value: Seeker role only. Action: During a conflict in which you are the attacking player - move the contested ring to another eligible province and reveal it, if able. That province is now the attacked province.

property.name: Text
property.value: Attach to a Courtier character you control. Action: Bow attached character - search the top 5 cards of your conflict deck for a card, reveal it, and add it to your hand. Shuffle.

property.name: Text
property.value: Play only if you have the Imperial Favor. Interrupt: When the effects of an event would initiate - cancel those effects.
